title: Statements of count to be filed
context: §40-8 Statements of count to be filed. The comptroller shall file the original copy of the statement with the governor, duplicate with the director of finance, and the comptroller shall post and maintain the triplicate copy in the comptroller&rsquo;s office for at least one month thereafter. [L 1927, c 219, pt of §16; RL 1935, §598; RL 1945, §1602; RL 1955, §34-52; am L 1957, c 152, §1; am L 1959, c 145, §3; am L Sp 1959 2d, c 1, §14; am L 1963, c 114, §1; HRS §40-8; gen ch 1985]
